summary: Fixes the matching set perks for heavy and light armors.
descriptionHtml:
This mod fixes the Matching Set perks for both Heavy and Light armors.

[list][*]Increases the armor bonus from 20% to 25% to match the perk description.
[/*]
[*]Gives you the bonus for having at least 4 items of the same armor type, instead of 1 in Hand, Feet, Head, and Chest[/*]
[/list]
I made this mod, because I am using an armor mod that has multiple pieces, but no helmet, so I couldn't get the bonus for having the perk
author: Shadow
